pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Screen_CLSPython script for clearing screen for any OS's: Windows, MAC, Linux## Setuphttps://pypi.org/project/screen-cls/**pip install screen-cls**## Example1:```import screen_clsscreen_cls.cls()```## Example2:```from screen_cls import *cls()```### Documentationhttps://best-itpro.ru/news/screen_cls/
